page.title: 05** MR.LEWIS REMEMBERS cont.*
page.content: The old school is now being leased and it is being converted into a private house.Llawhaden School has now closed and there is a new school in Wiston. A private house now called Three Ways was once the manse of Wiston Chapel. The village Post Office was formerly at Barretts Hill, now a private house, having been moved to its present location about 10 years ago. There is no Public House in the village, the Earls of Cawdor would not allow it.However, a licence was granted to serve alchohol at the annual hiring fair.This was held at the church bank up until the 1920's and farm servants would offer themselves for hire. The village pond has now been filled in but used to be on the left of the road leading out of Wiston to
